page.title: 13Wareham's Mayor.
page.content: The Mayor of Wareham is Mr.Albert Sutton.Mr.Sutton has been Mayor for 2 years and he enjoys his job.His duties include chairing meetings,going to civic events ie.fetes and jumble sales going to important services at the church and receiving complaints or praise from the citizens of Wareham. He thinks the worst point about Wareham is the increasing vandalism costing the council a lot of money. The best thing is the town itself with its historic and beautiful surroundings.Another good thing is the school activities going on in the town.Wareham has hardly changed in the last 900 years and he hopes it won't in the next 900 years,by demolition experts destroying the old houses and roads for modern buildings. { }
